content.rendered:
Every year, the University of La Verne community gathers to celebrate its graduating students at commencement.

The University of La Verne will celebrate the graduating Class of 2024 by degree level graduation ceremonies held at the end spring semester on May 31, 2025.

 

To view the Class of 2024 commencement ceremonies, please click on the preferred commencement ceremony to view livestream:

View Undergraduate Ceremony View Graduate Ceremony

 

Ceremony #1 – May 25, 2024 at 10am – ALL Undergraduate Degrees

Ceremony #2 – May 25, 2024 at 4pm – ALL Master and Doctoral Degrees

Pre-Commencement Events

Get information about regalia sales and special commencement events like Multicultural Graduation, Baccalaureate, and more.

Learn More
Commencement Ceremonies

The university will hold two commencement ceremonies separated by the graduates degree level. ALL Bachelor degrees and ALL Master and Doctoral degrees.

Watch the Livestreams
Commencement Program

View the University of La Verne Commencement Ceremonies program honoring the Class of 2024!

Commencement Program
Hooding Ceremonies

La Verne’s doctoral programs conduct hooding ceremonies for their students. Find out when and where.

Learn More

 

If you have questions, please email the Office of Commencement Services at commencement@laverne.edu.
